castVote(string,uint256,int16).details: Anyone with > 0 amount of tokens can vote. They can vote up to and including their share (but not necessarily all).      A positive _vote is considered in favour of the proposal and a negative is considered against it.

createGovernor(string,uint16,uint16).details: Necessary to set the newProposalShare for new proposals and to know if we've already initialized a governor

createProposal(address,string,string,uin.details: Anyone with at least newProposalShare share of tokens can create a new proposal here

params._projectId: Path of the org or repo which maps to the new token
params._symbol: Token Symbol for the new token

returns._0: The address of the new token contract

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._newProjectId: Path of the new org or repo which should be used
params._oldProjectId: Path of the old org or repo which should be updated

governorsByProjectId(string).notice: Maps org/repo path to a Governor

updateProjectId(string,string).notice: Used in case a project wants to transfer tokens from a repo to an org in the future for example
